posts.post_content:
Better than the low grade material available on ebay.  The registration is great as are the colors.  Lower grade for obvious reasons, but an excellent example of the tough HOF portrait for a binder set.

Price is $SOLD.  Shipping within the continental U.S. included.  Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiation.

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
